tiers_subtitle: Support the audit and unlock exclusive Genesis benefits.
why_audit_desc: Security is our #1 priority. A CertiK audit verifies our code logic, secures user funds, and is a mandatory requirement for listing on Tier-1 exchanges.
utility_notice: Utility Purchase Notice: By contributing to the Audit Fund or purchasing Founder Tiers, you acknowledge that you are acquiring digital utility items and tokens for use within the PierogiCoin game ecosystem. These contributions are donations towards project development (security audit) and do not represent an investment contract or equity stake.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Growing community and real use-cases for the token.

bonuses.title: Bonuses
bonuses.desc: Additional tokens for stage and investment size.

ux.title: UX
ux.desc: Solana Pay, fast amounts, MAX from balance.

q1.a: It's a community-driven initiative to fund a professional CertiK audit for PierogiCoin, ensuring maximum security before exchange listings.

q2.q: When will I get my PRG tokens?
q2.a: Tokens are allocated immediately. Withdrawal/Airdrop will occur during the TGE phase after the audit and liquidity setup.

q3.q: What happens after the audit goal is met?
q3.a: Once we reach $15,000 and complete the audit, we will move to Phase 2: The Main Presale. The token price will increase, and funds will be dedicated to Liquidity (CEX/DEX listing) and Global Marketing.

referral.title: Refer & Earn Program

referral.invite_text: Invite your friends to the Audit Fund and earn 5% of their contribution value in PRG tokens. Your friends also get an extra 2% bonus on their purchase!
